definition: ordinal number/day of a month/mark/sign/business establishment/size/ship suffix/horn (wind instrument)/bugle call/assumed name/to take a pulse/classifier used to indicate number of people

sentences.english: My back's crooked like a question mark.
sentences.chinese: 我媽說我的背弓得像個問號。

sentences.english: “I want that question mark there,” said Staub.
sentences.chinese: “我想這兒要留一個問號，”斯桃波說道。

sentences.english: The big unknown is what the spark for a crisis might be.
sentences.chinese: 危機的導火索會是什麼，這是個很大的問號。

sentences.english: For instance, it often changes apostrophes to question marks.
sentences.chinese: 例如，它經常改變撇號爲問號。

sentences.english: No more of those annoying yellow question marks. Good riddance.
sentences.chinese: 再不會有惱人的黃色問號了，真是不錯的解脫。

sentences.english: The question mark and asterisk can be used more than once in the same profile.
sentences.chinese: 可以在相同配置文件中使用多個問號和星號。

sentences.english: tagline should perhaps have been a question mark instead.
sentences.chinese: 這句標語後面的感嘆號或許應被一個問號所替代。

sentences.english: Stand in the street, holding a huge yellow paper made question mark over your head.
sentences.chinese: 站在街上，把一個紙做的大問號頂在頭頂。

sentences.english: That’s why so many of these posts end in a question mark, not an exclamation point.
sentences.chinese: 這也是爲什麼大多數文章的結尾都是問號而非感嘆號。

sentences.english: His posture would be unsatisfactory for a question mark.
sentences.chinese: 他的站姿就像一個歪歪扭扭的問號。

sentences.english: So there remains a question mark, " says Naumann.
sentences.chinese: 因此，結果如何仍要打個問號，”瑙曼說道。

sentences.english: Sexy question marks of smoke drifted up to the windows before vanishing.
sentences.chinese: 煙幕在消失之前形成了一個性感的問號。

sentences.english: Her reasons are not adequate, so I have doubts about the conclusion.
sentences.chinese: 她的理由不充分，所以對這個結論我要打問號。

sentences.english: My hope in this class is to bring up many more question marks than periods.
sentences.chinese: 我的希望是本課程培養的問號要比句號多。

sentences.english: To make an operator lazy, add a question-mark suffix.
sentences.chinese: 要使操作符變得懶惰，請添加問號後綴。

sentences.english: It may look like a nice airplane but I would not trust whats underneath the planes skin.
sentences.chinese: 飛機表面看起來不錯，但是裏面怎麼樣就要打問號了。

definition: things like this (idiom); and so on/and the rest/etc
only natural/as it should be/certainly/of course/without doubt
It is said that ... (at the start of a narrative)/to discuss/to recount
to talk about/to mention/(preposition) as for
to be amazed/to be surprised/to wonder
